alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 3:53PM CDT until May 30 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Peabody, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Peabody. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
